item.description:
Pretty n Pink Party!

Before I get to the nitty-gritty, I just want to say that I remember searching the internet for a social group on the Cape hoping to meet people and make new friends, however, there were none in my area that were close enough. I decided to take a leap of faith and make a Meetup of my own.

I planned our first Meetup for Sam Diegos for November 1, 2008.  I prayed that at least one woman would show up.  To my surprise, more than one did.  We had 5 total! Today we have 64! I never would have imagined.

I was grateful and have been grateful ever since to have had the honor to have met the most amazing women and make the most amazing friends!  One in particular is Barbara who is my right hand gal.  Without her the wheels may have stopped turning when I had to go away for two summers to run my campgound.  She is my rock, my partner in "crime", my friend and the glue that's held "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun" together! From the bottom of my heart, Thank You Barbara!

I also want to thank Nichole who is our "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun" Book Club Organizer and Leader!  This Brainiac Venture of hers has become such a hugh hit! 

I want to personally thank all of "You" who have taken the leap of faith with me by becoming a  member and who have helped make our social group the Best on the Cape! What an amazing accomplishment!

It's time to celebrate our accomplishment and what better a way to do it than on our  

100th Meetup!

The Plan:  Light bites for dinner--Please bring an appetizer to share!

I'm providing strawberries dipped in ChOcOlate!

BYOB! 

I will be making "Pink" Cosmopolitains.  Mar-tini glasses rimmed with "Pink" sugar if anyone wants to partake!  A Donation of 5.00 delleros would be much appreciated for it would help defray the cost of the alcohol, etc. if you would like to partake in multiple "Pink" concoctions!  Let me know if you'll be partaking in the "Pink" with me so I can plan accordingly. (shoot me an email, call or post it when you sign up)

Dress:  Off course wear something "Pink" Please!

"Pretty n Pink" Kick off for Fun, Food and Drink is 7 p.m.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll answer the door WEARING PINK!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Our 100th Meetup Celebration: Pretty n Pink Party!
